name: LegendsOfTheLostRealm
description: Designed as a friendpack, this modpack enhances the vanilla Valheim experience, making the game less tedious while improving network capabilities and balancing mods to ensure nothing feels overpowered. Whether you're a seasoned warrior or a brave new explorer, ';egends of the Lost Realm' offers endless excitement and challenges in the ultimate Valheim experience. Prepare for a saga of legend and loreâ€”your adventure awaits!
